language-server.description: Client and server configurations for a single language server

priority.title: Priority of the server
priority.description: When multiple servers match specific document/language, the server with the highest priority will be used

serverSettings.title: Language Server Configurations
serverSettings.description: Configuration to be sent to language server over LSP when initialized: see the specific language server's documentation for more

language_servers.title: Language Server

loggingConsole.title: Logging console type
loggingConsole.description: The console to use for debugging problems with this extension. Allowed values are: browser, floating.

loggingLevel.title: Logging console verbosity level
loggingLevel.description: The verbosity of the console for debugging problems with this extension. Allowed values are: debug, log, warn, error.

logAllCommunication.title: Log all LSP communication with the LSP servers
logAllCommunication.description: Whether all messages sent to and received from LSP servers should be logged into the console. To see these messages, set loggingLevel to debug or log. Note: Only messages handled by the new API will be shown.

setTrace.title: Ask servers to send trace notifications
setTrace.description: Whether to ask server to send logs with execution trace (for debugging). To see these messages, set loggingLevel to debug or log. Accepted values are: "off", "messages", "verbose". Servers are allowed to ignore this request.
